issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Inconsistent use of Box and Arc for TableProvider
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11620](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11620). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The API inconsistently uses Box<TableProvider> and Arc<TableProvider> – we should standardize on Arc

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11620?focusedCommentId=17285646) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9487
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9487>
